seg.source: 开普勒测量昂宿星团恒星的自转速度
seg.translation: Kepler measured the rotation speed of a star in the Pleiades star cluster
Kepler measures the rotational speed of a star in a Pleiades cluster
Kepler measures the rotation speed of the stars in the Pleiades cluster

seg.source: 这项开普勒太空望远镜的最新使命帮助天文学家采集了最完整的昂宿星团恒星自转速度。
seg.translation: The latest mission of the Kepler space telescope allowed astronomers to collect the most comprehensive information on the rotation speed of stars in the Pleiades.
The latest mission of the Kepler space telescope has helped astronomers capture the most complete star rotation rate in the Pleiades.
The Kepler Space Telescope's latest mission has helped astronomers capture the most complete rotation of stars in the Pleiades cluster.

seg.source: 新数据正在帮助天文学家了解为何该星团的恒星有不同的自转速度以及自转周期与星球组成的关联。
seg.translation: New data are helping astronomers understand why the stars of this cluster have different rotation rates, and the correlation between rotation cycles and the formation of planets.
The new data are helping astronomers understand why stars in the cluster have different rotational velocities and the correlation between the rotation cycle and the planet's composition.
The new data is helping astronomers understand why the cluster's stars rotate at different speeds and how their rotation cycles are related to the composition of the planet.

seg.source: 帕萨迪纳加州理工学院红外处理分析中心研究科学家卢萨·雷布尔在新闻发布会上表示：“我们希望通过比较我们的结果与其他星团进一步了解恒星质量、年龄、甚至其太阳系历史之间的关系。”
seg.translation: Luisa Rebull, a research scientist at the Infrared Processing and Analysis Center of California Institute of Technology at Pasadena, expressed in this press conference, “We hope to compare our results with other star clusters to gain further understanding of the mass and age of the stars, and even their relationship with the history of the solar system.”

"We hope to further understand the relationship between stellar mass, age, and even the history of the solar system by comparing our results with other clusters," said 卢萨·雷布尔, a researcher at the Center for Infrared processing and analysis at the California Institute of Technology in Pasadena. ”

"We hope to learn more about the relationship between star mass, age, and even the history of their solar system by comparing our results with other clusters," Luza Rebble, a research scientist at the Infrared Processing and Analysis Center at the California Institute of Technology in Pasadena, said in a press release.

seg.source: 昂宿星团距离地球445光年。
seg.translation: The Pleiades star cluster is 445 light-years away from Earth.
The Pleiades is 445 light-years from Earth.
The star cluster is 445 light-years away from Earth.

seg.source: 该星团中的许多恒星诞生于约1.25亿年前，目前还刚刚达到成年期。
seg.translation: Many of the stars in this star cluster were born about 125 million years ago. They have now just recently reached maturity.
Many of the stars in the cluster were born about 125 million years ago and have just reached adulthood.
Many of the stars in the cluster were born about 125 million years ago and are now just reaching adulthood.

seg.source: 它们达到了一生中最高的自转速度。
seg.translation: They reached their maximum rotation speeds.
They reach the highest rotational speed in their lifetimes.
They reached the highest speed of rotation in their lifetime.

seg.source: 在达到最高自转速度时，这些成熟的恒星射出大量恒星风。
seg.translation: Upon reaching the maximum rotation speed, the mature star will emit large amounts of stellar winds.
At the highest rotational speed, these mature stars shoot a large number of stellar winds.
At their maximum speed of rotation, these mature stars shoot out large amounts of stellar wind.

seg.source: 当这些恒星风穿过恒星的磁场时，它们会对恒星产生制动作用。
seg.translation: When these stars pass through the magnetic fields of stars, they would produce a braking effect on the stars.
When these stellar winds travel through the magnetic field of a star, they can produce a braking effect on the star.
When these stellar winds pass through the star's magnetic field, they act as a brake on the star.

seg.source: 随着恒星年龄的增加，其自转速度开始减慢。
seg.translation: Stars will rotate at a slower pace as they age.
As the age of the star increases, its rotational speed begins to slow down.
As a star ages, its rotation begins to slow down.

seg.source: 开普勒通过追踪可识别的恒星黑子（如同太阳黑子）出现的时间测量各恒星的自转速度。
seg.translation: Kepler tracked identifiable star spots (such as sunspots) and the time of their appearance to calculate the rotating speed of reach star.
Kepler measures the rotational velocities of the stars by tracking the time that a recognizable stellar sunspot (like sunspots) appears.
Kepler measures the speed of rotation of stars by tracking the appearance of identifiable sunspots, such as sunspots.

seg.source: 最新的自转速度数据集表明质量较大的恒星的自转速度慢于质量较小的恒星。
seg.translation: The latest data on rotation rates gathered indicated that stars with higher masses rotate at a slower rate than stars with lower masses.
The latest rotational velocity datasets show that the larger stars have a slower rotation rate than the smaller stars.
The latest set of rotation speed data indicates that the rotation speed of the more massive stars is slower than that of the less massive stars.

seg.source: 雷布尔将恒星比作舞者，体型较大的舞者旋转时的速度慢于体型较小的舞者。
seg.translation: Rebull compared the stars to dancers. Those with a larger physique pirouette at a slower rate compared to those who are more petite.
Raible compares a star to a dancer, and a larger dancer spins slower than a smaller dancer.
Rybl compared stars to dancers, with larger dancers spinning more slowly than smaller ones.

seg.source: 雷布尔表示：“在昂宿星团的‘芭蕾舞表演’中，我们发现自转速度较慢的恒星往往质量较大，而自转速度最快的恒星往往是最轻的恒星。”
seg.translation: Rebull expressed: “In the ‘ballet’ of the Pleiades, we found that stars with a slower self-rotating speed tend to have larger mass, while stars with higher rotation speeds tend to be the lightest.”
"In the ' ballet ' of the Pleiades, we found that stars with slower rotation tend to be of greater mass, and the fastest-spinning stars tend to be the lightest stars," says Raible. ”
"In the" ballet performance "of the Pleiades cluster, we found that stars with slower rotation tend to be more massive, while those with the fastest rotation tend to be the lightest," says Mr Reble.

seg.source: 由于昂宿星团距离较近，因此可以作为比较恒星质量与自转速度的理想宇宙实验室。
seg.translation: As the Pleiades is quite close, it has thus become an ideal lab in space for comparing masses and self-rotation speeds of stars.
Because the Pleiades cluster is close to each other, it can serve as an ideal cosmic laboratory for comparing stellar mass with rotational velocities.
Because of its close proximity, the Pleiades cluster could serve as an ideal cosmic laboratory for comparing the mass of stars with the speed of rotation.

seg.source: 雷布尔表示：“昂宿星团为年轻与年迈恒星的双向旋转理论模型奠定了基础。”
seg.translation: Raible indicated :" the Pleiades built a foundation for the bilateral rotation of young and old stellar.
"The Pleiades has laid the foundation for a two-way spin theory model for Young and aging stars," Raible said. ”
"The Pleiades cluster provides the foundation for theoretical models of two-way rotation of young and old stars," says Mr Reble.

seg.source: 关于恒星如何、何时以及为何减慢自转速度并且“收起自己的舞鞋”，我们仍有许多需要了解的知识。
seg.translation: As for how, when and why stars reduce their rotating speed and “keep away their dancing shoes”, there is still much that we need to learn.
We still have a lot of knowledge about how stars, when and why they slow their rotation and "put away their own dancing shoes."
We still have a lot to learn about how, when, and why stars slow down their rotation and "put away their dancing shoes."

seg.source: 雷布尔和她的同事在三篇新论文中详细阐述了他们对昂宿星团自转速度的最新分析。这三篇论文不久将发布在《天文学期刊》上。
seg.translation: Rebull and her colleagues gave a detailed elaboration of their latest analysis of the rotation rate of the Pleiades Cluster in three new theses. These theses will be published in the Astronomical Journal soon.

Raible and her colleagues elaborated on their latest analysis of the rotational speed of the Pleiades in three new papers. The three papers will soon be published in the Journal of the day literature.
Ribble and her colleagues detailed their latest analysis of the rotation speed of the star cluster in three new papers, which will soon be published in the Astronomical Journal.
